name: Frogwrecker
description:
Click into the window to start playing.

This is my first pico-8 game and I think it turned out pretty well. Have fun!

In normal mode, collect frogs as fast as possible to gain the maximum score.

Controls:

Press X to confirm menu choices.

Hold Z for 2 sec. during a run to back out into the difficulty select menu.

Press P or Enter to toggle the music on and off.
